question: When starting ballasting .......... valve should be opened last.

options: 2) Switching the voltage regulator to manual
3) Decreasing the field excitation to minumum
4) Reducing the load on the unit
5) Increasing the load on the unit
correctAnswer: 4) Reducing the load on the unit

question: In case of burning of radio equipments on the bridge the extinguishers should be the same as the ones to be used in ......................... fires, keeping in mind that the fire will turn out to be a ......................... fire when starting firefighting takes long.
The main characteristics of a diesel engine is:
options: 1) internal combustion engine; the fuel is burned external of the cylinders
3) either 2 or 4 stroke, fuel is burned inside the cylinders
4) economical in compare with the steam engines, but hard maintenance
5) fixed sequence of events within its unique type
correctAnswer: 3) either 2 or 4 stroke, fuel is burned inside the cylinders

question: On a diesel engine, a freshwater heat exchanger is used rather than a saltwater to:
options: 3) Cut down on rust and corrosion
4) Keep the engine block from freezing in cold weather
correctAnswer: 3) Cut down on rust and corrosion

question: As Freon leaves the expansion valve ..........................
options: 5) Pressure increases - No change in the volume

question: An overheated bearing in the main propulsion unit is indicated by:
options: 3) A high oil level in the sump
4) Low temperature of the lube oil leaving the bearing
5) High temperature of the lube oil leaving the bearing
correctAnswer: 5) High temperature of the lube oil leaving the bearing
